sprint_goal: Enable new users to register for an account and log in securely to the platform.
Implement secure user logout with session invalidation and begin the account recovery flow by allowing users to request a password reset.
Complete the account recovery feature, allowing users to set a new password and ensuring all old sessions are terminated.
Deliver the full Multi-Factor Authentication setup flow, allowing security-conscious users to enable TOTP on their accounts.
Complete the MFA feature by enabling users with MFA to securely log in using their authenticator app code.
